*10 spicy *10 dry *0 sweet *10 bitter *0 sour }} '''Hondew''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with exactly 15 points of spicy, dry and bitter and 0 points of all other flavours.
